meanings.definition: The quality or state of being oneself.
meanings.sent1: Her selfnesses shone through in her unique style of painting.
meanings.sent2: His selfnesses was evident in the way he always stayed true to himself.
meanings.sent3: The cat's selfnesses was on full display as it confidently strutted around the room.
meanings.sent4: The selfnesses of the old tree was a testament to its resilience and strength.
meanings.sent5: The selfnesses of the character in the story made it easy for readers to relate to her.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a distinct identity or individuality.
meanings.sent1: The selfnesses of the small town was evident in its close-knit community.
meanings.sent2: Each artist's selfnesses was reflected in their unique creations.
meanings.sent3: The selfnesses of the quirky robot made it stand out among the others.
meanings.sent4: The selfnesses of the mountain range was unlike any other in the region.
meanings.sent5: The selfnesses of the flower was so striking that it caught everyone's attention.
